name: ali-sdk
description: An sdk include all aliyun, taobao, tmall, alibaba open apis.

scripts.test-cov: node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --check-leaks -t 5000 -r co-mocha test/*.test.js
scripts.test-travis: node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --check-leaks -t 5000 -r co-mocha test/*.test.js

author: fengmk2 <m@fengmk2.com> (http://fengmk2.com)
